title: Print a Player Letter for a Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user wants to print a letter for a Player
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Create New dropdown on a Player
custom_expected:
THEN "Player Letters" will now be an option along with "Transactions" and "Contracts" in the top level dropdown of the pro player profile Create New menu. 
AND This will appear from the player history as well as the roster widgets. 
AND Selecting "Player Letters" will display a secondary dropdown with the available player letters that can be created for the player (This will be all or nothing). 
AND The secondary dropdown should be wide enough to accommodate the names of the player letters. (An example is "Consent to Continue Rehab at ST Facility Beyond 20 Days")
AND Selecting a Player Letter from the dropdown will download a pdf of the selected letter, pulling in the player's information to the form

title: Print a Consent Form Rehab Assignment letter for a Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to Print a Consent Form Rehab Assignment letter
AND has clicked Create New
AND has selected "Consent Form Rehab Assignment"
custom_expected:
THEN a PDF will be generated
AND Users will have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND Users will have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND Users will have the ability to select the "Transfer to Club" from the list of Clubs affiliated with the Player's Org.
AND Users will have the ability to enter in the number of Rehab Assignment Days to be populated on the form.

title: Print a Return to Play form for a Reinstate from DL tx
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a Reinstate from DL tx
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks Print
AND selects "Return from Play" form
custom_expected:
THEN PDF will be generated
AND If the player is on the DL for a Concussion, then clicking on Print should open a menu where the user can choose to print a Return to Play form.

title: Rename widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as the BOC
AND wants to view the Reinstatement widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the transaction tab
custom_expected:
THEN they will see the Reinstatement tab now called "Players on Disabled List"
AND all permissions still remain

title: Receive email when player requires a DL Recert
custom_preconds: GIVEN users email is listed on the Email Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN player is placed on the DL who requires a Recertification
AND system checks to see if "Send Emails" is set to Yes. 
AND system checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for Clubs for the "DL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
AND system also checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for the BOC for the "DL E-recerts" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility.
custom_expected:
THEN user should receive email
AND notification is generated for Club

title: Club receives email when a player is missing an SFD
custom_preconds: GIVEN users email is listed on the Email Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN player is placed on the DL who requires a Recertification
AND system checks to see if "Send Emails" is set to Yes. 
AND system checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for Clubs for the "SFD Overdue Emails" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility. 
AND system also checks to see if "Send Notification" is checked for the BOC for the "SFD Overdue Emails" under the Transactions section of the Email Utility.
custom_expected:
THEN user should receive email
AND notification is generated for Club
